metadata.title: CVE-2024-5953 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A denial of service vulnerability was found in the 389-ds-base LDAP server.This issue may allow an authenticated user to cause a server denial ofservice while attempting to log in with a user with a malformed hash intheir password.

criterions.comment: 389-ds-base package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
